sentences.en: A copy should then be sent to Personnel for our files.
sentences.cn: 然后必须送一份到人事部供我们存档。

sentences.en: All personnel are to receive security badges.
sentences.cn: 所有人员都将拿到安保徽章。

sentences.en: All the managerial personnel at the factory are hired on contract.
sentences.cn: 工厂所有管理人员都是聘用的.

sentences.en: Ex-forces personnel could be the manna from heaven employers are seeking.
sentences.cn: 当过兵的人大概是雇主们寻找的宝贝了。

sentences.en: Five other US military personnel were killed in various incidents.
sentences.cn: 另有5名美军士兵死于各种意外。

sentences.en: He recently vacated his post as NHS Personnel Director.
sentences.cn: 他最近辞去了国民保健署人事主管一职。

sentences.en: I looked your address up in the personnel file.
sentences.cn: 我在人事档案里找到了你的地址。

sentences.en: Now's the time when we are in need of personnel.
One of the problem areas is lax security for airport personnel.
sentences.cn: 问题之一是对机场员工的安检措施马虎松懈。

sentences.en: The Army boys had personnel carriers blockading the cross streets.
sentences.cn: 陆军士兵用运兵车封锁了十字路口。

sentences.en: The General does not like non-combatant personnel near a scene of action.
sentences.cn: 将军不喜欢非战斗部队人员靠近战场。

sentences.en: The personnel are not happy to change these rules.
sentences.cn: 全体工作人员对改变这些规定很不高兴.

sentences.en: There were armoured personnel carriers and tanks on the streets.
sentences.cn: 街上有装甲运兵车和坦克。

sentences.en: They fell into that twilight zone between military personnel and civilian employees.
sentences.cn: 他们成了军队人员与平民雇员之间身份界定不清的人。

sentences.en: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.cn: 他们缺少能够进一步研发这一技术装置的科研人员。

words.tran_cn: 全体人员,全体职员,劳动力;军队,战斗力

phrases.tran_cn: 保修人员；服务行业人员

trans.tran_en: the department in a company that chooses people for jobs and deals with their complaints, problems etc
